name: Crawler
description: A pale, eyeless humanoid that dwells in caves and abandoned mines. Crawlers can scale any surface and strike from impossible angles.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Can move over cliffs and scale vertical surfaces.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrows underground, becoming invisible and regenerating health.

abilities.name: Ambush Strike
abilities.description: First attack from burrow deals double damage and stuns.

abilities.name: Echolocation
abilities.description: Reveals all units in a large area, including invisible ones.
